summary: the specimens were collected from children aged 19 days to 15 years. they were tested with the filmArray Respiratory Panel, a multiplex PCR assay. it detects 16 viruses, including mycoplasma pneumoniae, Bordetella pertussis and Chlamydophila pneumoniae. nasopharyngeal swab and sputum samples from different age groups detected with FilmArray RP.
